languages.text: "Не верится, что губернатор Тассеры так легко обманул своих подданных. Неужели манеры подставного правителя не вызвали подозрений?"

traits.locale_text: "Не верится, что губернатор Тассеры так легко обманул своих подданных. Неужели манеры подставного правителя не вызвали подозрений?"

languages.text: "I can hardly believe that the governor of Thassera managed to deceive his subjects so easily. Was no one suspicious of the decoy ruler's manners?"
languages.original_text: "Не верится, что губернатор Тассеры так легко обманул своих подданных. Неужели манеры подставного правителя не вызвали подозрений?"

traits.locale_text: "I can hardly believe that the governor of Thassera managed to deceive his subjects so easily. Was no one suspicious of the decoy ruler's manners?"
"I can hardly believe that the governor of Thassera managed to deceive his subjects so easily. Was no one suspicious of the decoy ruler's manners?"

"I can hardly believe that the governor of Thassera managed to deceive his subjects so easily. Was no one suspicious of the decoy ruler's manners?"
"I can hardly believe that the governor of Thassera managed to deceive his subjects so easily. Was no one suspicious of the decoy ruler's manners?"

languages.text: 「タッセーラの総督があれほど容易く民を欺けたとは、にわかには信じられません。誰もあの替え玉の振る舞いに疑念を抱かなかったのですか？」
languages.original_text: "I can hardly believe that the governor of Thassera managed to deceive his subjects so easily. Was no one suspicious of the decoy ruler's manners?"

traits.locale_text: 「タッセーラの総督があれほど容易く民を欺けたとは、にわかには信じられません。誰もあの替え玉の振る舞いに疑念を抱かなかったのですか？」

languages.text: "Ich kann kaum glauben, dass der Gouverneur von Thassera seine Untertanen so leicht täuschen konnte. Haben denn die Manieren des falschen Herrschers niemanden misstrauisch gemacht?"
languages.original_text: "I can hardly believe that the governor of Thassera managed to deceive his subjects so easily. Was no one suspicious of the decoy ruler's manners?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich kann kaum glauben, dass der Gouverneur von Thassera seine Untertanen so leicht täuschen konnte. Haben denn die Manieren des falschen Herrschers niemanden misstrauisch gemacht?"

languages.text: « J'ai peine à comprendre comment le gouverneur de Thassera a pu tromper ses sujets aussi facilement. Personne n'a donc remarqué que ce faux dirigeant avait des manières étranges ? »
languages.original_text: "I can hardly believe that the governor of Thassera managed to deceive his subjects so easily. Was no one suspicious of the decoy ruler's manners?"

traits.locale_text: « J'ai peine à comprendre comment le gouverneur de Thassera a pu tromper ses sujets aussi facilement. Personne n'a donc remarqué que ce faux dirigeant avait des manières étranges ? »

languages.text: «No puedo creer que el gobernador de Thassera lograse engañar a sus súbditos con tanta facilidad. ¿Es que nadie recelaba de los deficientes modales de su falso soberano?».
languages.original_text: "I can hardly believe that the governor of Thassera managed to deceive his subjects so easily. Was no one suspicious of the decoy ruler's manners?"

traits.locale_text: «No puedo creer que el gobernador de Thassera lograse engañar a sus súbditos con tanta facilidad. ¿Es que nadie recelaba de los deficientes modales de su falso soberano?».

languages.text: “我简直不敢相信，塔瑟拉的总督居然能轻而易举地骗过他的臣民。那个傀儡总督的言行举止，就没有引起过任何人的怀疑吗？”
languages.original_text: "I can hardly believe that the governor of Thassera managed to deceive his subjects so easily. Was no one suspicious of the decoy ruler's manners?"

traits.locale_text: “我简直不敢相信，塔瑟拉的总督居然能轻而易举地骗过他的臣民。那个傀儡总督的言行举止，就没有引起过任何人的怀疑吗？”

languages.text: "Thassera valisinin tebaasını bu denli kolay kandırabildiğine inanamıyorum. Sahtekârın hâlini, tavrını kimse fark etmedi mi yani?"
languages.original_text: "I can hardly believe that the governor of Thassera managed to deceive his subjects so easily. Was no one suspicious of the decoy ruler's manners?"

traits.locale_text: "Thassera valisinin tebaasını bu denli kolay kandırabildiğine inanamıyorum. Sahtekârın hâlini, tavrını kimse fark etmedi mi yani?"

languages.original_text: "I can hardly believe that the governor of Thassera managed to deceive his subjects so easily. Was no one suspicious of the decoy ruler's manners?"
